West (; Southern Sotho: ; ) is a province of South Africa. Its capital is Mahikeng, but its largest city is Klerksdorp. == Geography == The province is located on the border with Botswana. It borders the South African provinces of Gauteng, Northern Cape, Limpopo and the Free State, as well as the Motswana districts of Kgalagadi, Southern, and South-eastern. == References == == Other websites == *North West Provincial Government *North West Parks and Tourism Board Category:1994 establishments in South Africa
title: North West (South African province)
